name: BugSmash
0:
”Alexa, open bug smash”
”Alexa, play bug smash”
”Alexa, start bug smash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bug smash
des:
You are off on a jungle adventure saving lost animals. You have a rescue truck to save them with, but watch out for those pesky bugs that are buzzing around. Fortunately you have a fly swatter, and can take care of them when the come too close.

This game uses either your voice, or two echo buttons. Listen carefully to the the sounds played through your Echo device. 

If you have two Echo buttons, press them at the start to set them up, then listen carefully to the sounds played.

If you hear an insect, press the red button or say 'smash' to get the bug.
If you hear an animal, press the blue button to save it or say 'save', then continue your search for more animals.

The game tracks your score. See how many you can get in a row and fill up the rescue truck!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
